resources.string: Amalgamation of conventional board teaching, using animations and technology to trigger senses for retention!
Curriculum curated to match and relate topics to make it easier for students to grasp!

We stand out with the unique process of Engage+ which enables the environment of learning to be discussion based ultimately helping us to know whether the student has really understood what we taught in the class or not!
Engaging teachers, expert in theoretical & practical aspects of subjects!
